layout_strategies.hero: Split screen: Left aligned typography (H1 + Subtext + CTA), Right aligned 3D/Abstract visual or Dashboard Mockup. Background: Deep Obsidian with subtle grid and green glow.
layout_strategies.features: Bento Grid (Mode A): Mix of large hero cards (col-span-2) and smaller detail cards. Use 'Tracing Beam' effect on hover.
layout_strategies.trust_section: Marquee of grayscale logos that turn full color on hover. Opacity 50% default.
layout_strategies.dashboard_preview: High-density grid. Dark mode UI. Neon accents for data points. Glassmorphism overlays for menus.

universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text unless it's a very subtle shine.
Always use 'Outfit' for headings and 'Inter' for body.
Primary color (Neon Green) is for SUCCESS and ACTION only. Do not overuse.
Use 2x padding. If you think p-4 is enough, use p-8.
All interactive elements must have a hover state (brightness-110 or translate-y-1).
Ensure all images have alt text.
Add data-testid to all interactive elements.
